/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft glow of daylight. Trees line the street, their leaves a vibrant splash of green against the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the expansive canvas. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, lending an almost surreal quality to the scene.
